title: 212-Armenian Folklore: Witchy Woman
itunes:title: 212-Armenian Folklore: Witchy Woman
description:
An awesome story about a young king who wants to do the impossible! And the ill-advised! And, frankly, makes a kind of stupid choice to go into the murder forest that took the lives of his father and six consecutive brothers.

Inside, a deeper, darker secret lurks, one that brings fairies, witches, sorcery, and...love?

The creature is a tall hairy man who takes issue with your dating choices...all while visiting half the town every night.

--

The membership: https://mythpodcast.com/membership

The store: https://myths.link/store

The item this week (hen bag hand bag): https://myths.link/henbag


Sponsors:

Talkspace: We're so glad we found Talkspace. Check it out and get $100 off your first month at http://talkspace.com using the code MYTHS

--

Music:

"Lope and Shimmer" by Podington Bear

“Lemania” by Blue Dot Sessions

“McCarthy” by Blue Dot Sessions

“Apollo Diedre” by Blue Dot Sessions

“Just Watching” by Podington Bear


Support the show: https://www.mythpodcast.com/membership
